title: (x) Contemporary Art Society logotype - Foundry Monoline {Yves}
content:
Hello

Any idea what this is? Sort of recent cross between Univers / Eurostyle... shades of Polaris + Klavika  
Logotype recently refreshed by Thomas manss (March 2007)... in action here: [http://www.contempart.org.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165905/http:/www.contempart.org.uk/ "http://www.contempart.org.uk/")  
Any clues much appreciated!

best regards  
Matt

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165905im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ContemporaryArtSociety_4333.png)

 [‹ (x) "Muse" ornate didone - modified Walbaum {Simon H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165905/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41553 "Go to previous forum topic") [Wim Crouwel Hiroshima poster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165905/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41555 "Go to next forum topic")
author: modernactivity

comments.content:
Amazing!

Thanks for this incredibly fast response; just trying to figure out what it is that makes me feel uncomfortable about this face... Just trying to find out who/where it was designed.

once again, - cheers!

Matt

looks like it is a David Quay design; very well made... perhaps a little cold, but impressively balanced nonetheless.

[http://www.davidquaydesign.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165905/http:/www.davidquaydesign.com/ "http://www.davidquaydesign.com/")
